t: Rooh Afza - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Rooh Afza (Urdu: روح افزا; Hindi: रूह अफ़ज़ा; Bengali: রূহ আফজা; lit. 'Soul Refresher') is a drink which is a concentrated squash. It was formulated in 1906 in India by Hakim Abdul Hameed and introduced by Hakim Hafiz Abdul Majeed.
